name: mobile

scripts.analyze-bundle: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android-bundle.js --assets-dest android-assets && npx react-native-bundle-visualizer --bundle android-bundle.js --out bundle-report.html
scripts.analyze-bundle-ios: react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ios-bundle.js --assets-dest ios-assets && npx react-native-bundle-visualizer --bundle ios-bundle.js --out bundle-report-ios.html
scripts.optimize-assets: npm run optimize-images && npm run gen:android:icons
